beans.Name: String bean
beans.Description: Stand up really tall with your hands in the air

beans.Name: Broad bean
beans.Description: Stand with your hands to the side and be broad

beans.Name: Runner bean
beans.Description: Run on the spot as fast as you can

beans.Name: Baked bean
beans.Description: Lay on the floor in a ball

beans.Name: Chilli bean
beans.Description: Shiver like you are really cold

beans.Name: beans on Toast
beans.Description: Lay on the floor like a starfish
